title: SOLD: 1913 T200 Fatima - Philadelphia (NL) w/Alexander & Rixey Rookies
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1913 T200 Fatima - Philadelphia (NL) w/Alexander & Rixey Rookies
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a 1913 T200 Fatima - Philadelphia (NL) Team card picturing HOF Rookies Grover Alexander & Eppa Rixey which has been graded an SGC 40 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan of the card for condition details and please note that the Fatima back is clean. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
